languages.text: {n}Во вздохе Ксавьера столько тяжести, что хватило бы загрузить орбитальный шаттл. Щелкнув тумблером, он переводит Ярмо в пассивное состояние.{/n} "Мне кажется, на сегодня достаточно. Неплохо сработано, Ваша Светлость".

{n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Во вздохе Ксавьера столько тяжести, что хватило бы загрузить орбитальный шаттл. Щелкнув тумблером, он переводит Ярмо в пассивное состояние.{/n} "Мне кажется, на сегодня достаточно. Неплохо сработано, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is so heavy that it would be enough to completely load an orbital shuttle. Flicking the tumbler, he switches the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} I think this is enough for today. Good job, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is so heavy that it would be enough to completely load an orbital shuttle. Flicking the tumbler, he switches the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} I think this is enough for today. Good job, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is so heavy, it would be enough to completely load an orbital shuttle. At the flip of a switch, he changes the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} I think this will do it for today. Good job, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is so heavy, it would be enough to completely load an orbital shuttle. At the flip of a switch, he changes the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} I think this will do it for today. Good job, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar pousse un soupir si lourd qu'il suffirait à surcharger une navette orbitale. Il actionne un commutateur qui fait basculer le Joug en mode passif et dit :{/n} « Je pense que nous en avons fait assez pour aujourd'hui. Excellent travail, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar pousse un soupir si lourd qu'il suffirait à surcharger une navette orbitale. Il actionne un commutateur qui fait basculer le Joug en mode passif et dit :{/n} « Je pense que nous en avons fait assez pour aujourd'hui. Excellent travail, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}El suspiro de Calcazar es tan pesado que podría sobrecargar una lanzadera orbital. Pulsa un solo interruptor para devolver al Yugo a su modo de espera.{/n} «Creo que con esto será suficiente por hoy. Buen trabajo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El suspiro de Calcazar es tan pesado que podría sobrecargar una lanzadera orbital. Pulsa un solo interruptor para devolver al Yugo a su modo de espera.{/n} «Creo que con esto será suficiente por hoy. Buen trabajo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎发出了沉重的叹息声，似乎足以把穿梭机压得飞不起来。他按下了开关，将圣枷切换到了被动模式。{/n}“我相信，我们今天的工作做得已经够多了。干得漂亮，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}希维尔发出了沉重的叹息声，似乎足以把穿梭机压得飞不起来。他按下了开关，将圣枷切换到了被动模式。{/n}“我觉得，今天就到此为止吧。干得漂亮，大人。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Auf Calcazars Seufzer lastet genügend Gewicht, um ein Orbitalshuttle damit bis unter das Dach zu beladen. Mit einem einzigen Tastendruck schaltet er das Joch in den Passivmodus.{/n} "Ich glaube, für heute haben wir genug erreicht. Sehr gute Arbeit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazars Seufzen ist so schwer, dass es ausreichen würde, ein Orbitalshuttle vollständig zu beladen. Mit einem Tastendruck schaltet er das Joch in den Passivmodus.{/n} "Ich glaube, das reicht für heute. Gute Arbeit, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}カルカサルのため息は、軌道上のシャトルの積載量を超えそうなほどに重いものだった。スイッチを押すと、彼はヨークをパッシブモードに切り替える。{/n}「今日この日、我々は素晴らしい成果を収めたと言えるだろう。称賛に値する成果だ、閣下」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルのため息は、軌道上のシャトルの積載量を超えそうなほどに重いものだった。スイッチを押すと、彼はヨークをパッシブモードに切り替える。{/n}「今日この日、我々は素晴らしい成果を収めたと言えるだろう。称賛に値する成果だ、閣下」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: {n}Calcazar'ın nefesi, yörüngesel bir mekiği ağzına kadar doldurabilecek kadar ağır. Göz açıp kapayana dek Boyunduruk'u pasif moda alıyor.{/n} "Bence bugün yeterince iş yaptık. Takdire şayandı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar's sigh is laden with enough weight to load an orbital shuttle to the brim. With the flip of a switch, he transitions the Yoke into passive mode.{/n} "I believe we have accomplished enough this day. Commendably done, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
